remarks: Closed form of right-to-left implication of ~ 19.41 , Theorem 19.41 of [Margaris] p. 90.  Derived from ~ 19.41rgVD .  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 8-Feb-2014.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: 19.41rg $p |- ( A. x ( ps -> A. x ps ) -> ( ( E. x ph /\ ps ) -> E. x ( ph /\ ps ) ) ) $.
